Category.name: bonds
Category.description: functions to construct and use Bond objects.
Category.copyright: Copyright (C) 2006, 2007 Chiara Fornarola Copyright (C) 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 Ferdinando Ametrano Copyright (C) 2005, 2006 Eric Ehlers Copyright (C) 2005 Plamen Neykov Copyright (C) 2005 Walter Penschke Copyright (C) 2009 Piter Dias Copyright (C) 2013 Cheng Li

Member.name: CALBondSettlementDays
Member.description: Returns the number of settlement days of the bond.

Member.name: CALBondCalendar
Member.description: Returns the calendar of the bond, e.g. TARGET.

Member.name: CALBondNotionals
Member.description: Returns the notionals of the bond.

Member.name: CALBondNotional
Member.description: Returns the notional of the bond at a given date.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Member.name: CALBondMaturityDate
Member.description: Returns the maturity date of the bond.

Member.name: CALBondIssueDate
Member.description: Returns the issue date of the bond.

Member.name: CALBondIsTradable
Member.description: Returns TRUE if the given Bond is tradable at the given settlement date. The current bond settlement is used if no date is given.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Member.name: CALBondSettlementDate
Member.description: Returns the settlement date of the bond.

Parameter.name: EvaluationDate
Parameter.description: The current global Settings::EvaluationDate is used if no specific date is given.

Member.name: CALBondOptionAdjustedSpread
Member.description: Returns the oas of the bond regards to a specific curve.

Parameter.name: CleanPrice
Parameter.description: market quoted clean price for the target bond.

Parameter.name: YieldCurve
Parameter.description: discounting yield term structure object ID.

Procedure.name: CALBondStartDate
Procedure.description: Returns the start (i.e. first accrual) date for the given Bond object.

Procedure.name: CALBondPreviousCashFlowDate
Procedure.description: Returns the previous cash flow date.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondNextCashFlowDate
Procedure.description: Returns the next cash flow amount.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondPreviousCashFlowAmount
Procedure.description: Returns the previous cash flow amount.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondNextCashFlowAmount
Procedure.description: Returns the next cash flow date.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondPreviousCouponRate
Procedure.description: Returns the previous coupon rate. Depending on (the Bond and) the given date it can be historic, deterministic or expected in a stochastic sense. When the bond settlement date is used the coupon is the last paid one.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondNextCouponRate
Procedure.description: Returns the next coupon rate. Depending on (the Bond and) the given date it can be historic, deterministic or expected in a stochastic sense. When the bond settlement date is used the coupon is the already-fixed not-yet-paid one.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccrualStartDate
Procedure.description: Returns the accrual start date for the current coupon of the given bond.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccrualEndDate
Procedure.description: Returns the accrual end date for the current coupon of the given bond.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondReferencePeriodStart
Procedure.description: Returns the reference period start date for the current coupon of the given bond.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondReferencePeriodEnd
Procedure.description: Returns the reference period end date for the current coupon of the given bond.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccrualPeriod
Procedure.description: Returns the total accrual period for the current coupon of the given bond. The current bond settlement is used if no date is given.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccrualDays
Procedure.description: Returns the total number of accrual days for the current coupon of the given bond. The current bond settlement is used if no date is given.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccruedPeriod
Procedure.description: Returns the accrued period for the current coupon of the given bond. The current bond settlement is used if no date is given.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccruedDays
Procedure.description: Returns the accrued days for the current coupon of the given bond. The current bond settlement is used if no date is given.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAccruedAmount
Procedure.description: Returns the accrued amount for the given bond. The current bond settlement is used if no date is given.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondCleanPriceFromYieldTermStructure
Procedure.description: Returns the bond clean price implied by the given YieldTermStructure and settlement date.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondBpsFromYieldTermStructure
Procedure.description: Returns the basis point sensitivity implied by the given YieldTermStructure and settlement date.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondAtmRateFromYieldTermStructure
Procedure.description: Returns the ATM rate implied by the given YieldTermStructure, settlement date, and clean price.

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondCleanPriceFromYield
Procedure.description: Returns the bond clean price implied by the given yield and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondDirtyPriceFromYield
Procedure.description: Returns the bond dirty price implied by the given yield and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondBpsFromYield
Procedure.description: Returns the basis point sensitivity implied by the given yield and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondYieldFromCleanPrice
Procedure.description: Returns the yield for the given bond corresponding to the given clean price and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondDurationFromYield
Procedure.description: Returns the duration implied by the given yield and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondConvexityFromYield
Procedure.description: Returns the convexity implied by the given yield and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondYieldPV01
Procedure.description: Returns the duration implied by the given yield and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondCleanPriceFromZSpread
Procedure.description: Returns the bond clean price implied by the given Z-Spread, discount curve, and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondYieldTermStructurePV01
Procedure.description: Returns the bond PV01 implied by the given discount curve, and settlement date. Only valid for vanilla bond

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondZSpreadFromCleanPrice
Procedure.description: Returns the z-spread for the given bond corresponding to the given clean price and settlement date.

Parameter.name: Compounding
Parameter.description: Interest rate coumpounding rule (Simple:1+rt, Compounded:(1+r)^t, Continuous:e^{rt}).

Parameter.name: Frequency
Parameter.description: frequency (e.g. Annual, Semiannual, Every4Month, Quarterly, Bimonthly, Monthly).

Parameter.name: SettlementDate
Parameter.description: The current bond settlement date is used if no specific date is given.

Member.name: CALBondCleanPrice
Member.description: Returns the clean price for the given bond.

Member.name: CALBondRedemptionAmount
Member.description: Returns the redemption amount of the bond.

Member.name: CALBondRedemptionDate
Member.description: Returns the redemption payment date of the bond.

Member.name: CALBondFlowAnalysis
Member.description: Returns the bond cash flow analysis.

Parameter.name: AfterDate
Parameter.description: Shows only cashflows after given date

Member.name: CALBondSetCouponPricer
Member.description: Set the coupon pricer at the given Bond object.

Member.name: CALBondSetCouponPricers
Member.description: Set the coupon pricer at the given Bond object.

Member.name: CALFixedRateBondConversionFactor
Member.description: get the corresponding conversion factor for a fixed rate bond.

Parameter.description: Bond description string. Autogenerated if null

Parameter.name: Rule
Parameter.description: Date generation rule (Backward, Forward, ThirdWednesday, Twentieth, TwentiethIMM, Zero).

Parameter.name: FirstDate
Parameter.description: stub date, if there is an irregular starting period.

Parameter.name: NextToLastDate
Parameter.description: stub date, if there an irregular final period.

Parameter.name: Description
Parameter.description: Bond description string. Autogenerated if null

Parameter.name: IsInArrears
Parameter.description: TRUE if the fixing is in arrears.

Procedure.name: CALBondAlive
Procedure.description: filters the Bond object IDs of the still alive Bonds.

Parameter.name: RefDate
Parameter.description: reference date at which evaluate alive bonds. The current evaluation date is used if no specific date is given.

Procedure.name: CALBondMaturityLookup
Procedure.description: returns the first maturity-matching Bond object ID.

Parameter.name: Maturity
Parameter.description: maturity date to look up Bonds for.

Procedure.name: CALBondMaturitySort
Procedure.description: sorts the Bond object IDs by maturity.
